meanings.definition: A person who is excessively enthusiastic about a particular trend or fashion.
meanings.sent1: Many faddists quickly adopt new trends in fashion.
meanings.sent2: The group of faddists eagerly followed the latest trend in music.
meanings.sent3: The faddists were so excited about the new trend that they all wore the same outfit.
meanings.sent4: She was a faddist when it came to trying out new hairstyles.
meanings.sent5: The faddists' enthusiasm for the latest trend was contagious.

meanings.sent1: The faddists gathered to discuss their favorite trends.
meanings.sent2: In the room full of faddists, each had their own unique style.
meanings.sent3: The faddists formed a club to share their love for different fashions.
meanings.sent4: The faddists stood out in the crowd with their bold choices.
meanings.sent5: Among the faddists, there was a sense of camaraderie in their shared passion.
